cell.paragraph:
The editor allows you to view and edit the Eiffel
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Conventions/10_Terminology.htm#class classes that are included in your solution.

The screenshot shows the editor with one
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Conventions/10_Terminology.htm#class class open for editing, ROOT_CLASS. You can open as many
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Conventions/10_Terminology.htm#class class source texts as you desire and choose between them by clicking the tab corresponding to the
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Conventions/10_Terminology.htm#class class you wish to edit/view.
